Sentencas: We developed a new and efficient sulfur-tolerant catalyst for application as a solid oxide electrolysis cell (SOEC) cathode designed with in situ exsolved CoNi alloy nanoparticles anchored on a RuddlesdenPopper (R.P.) support of La1.2Sr0.8Co0.4Mn0.6O4 and evaluated its catalytic activity for CO2 electrolysis to CO under a CO2 gas stream containing H2S species.
Titulo: A sulfur-tolerant cathode catalyst fabricated with in situ exsolved CoNi alloy nanoparticles anchored on a Ruddlesden-Popper support for CO2 electrolysis

Sentencas: This catalyst was prepared by in situ annealing of a perovskite derivative (La0.6Sr0.4Co0.5Ni0.2Mn0.3O3) in a 20% H-2/N-2 gas at 800 degrees C.
Titulo: A sulfur-tolerant cathode catalyst fabricated with in situ exsolved CoNi alloy nanoparticles anchored on a Ruddlesden-Popper support for CO2 electrolysis

Sentencas: The catalyst exhibited good reversibility of structural transitions during reduction and re-oxidation processes.
Titulo: A sulfur-tolerant cathode catalyst fabricated with in situ exsolved CoNi alloy nanoparticles anchored on a Ruddlesden-Popper support for CO2 electrolysis

Sentencas: A high current density of 703 mA cm(-2) was achieved at 1.3 V and 850 degrees C with a maximum faradaic efficiency of 97.8%.
Titulo: A sulfur-tolerant cathode catalyst fabricated with in situ exsolved CoNi alloy nanoparticles anchored on a Ruddlesden-Popper support for CO2 electrolysis

Sentencas: In situ grown CoNi alloy nanoparticles and the high oxygen vacancy content in the R.P. support were responsible for its high catalytic activity and efficiency.
Titulo: A sulfur-tolerant cathode catalyst fabricated with in situ exsolved CoNi alloy nanoparticles anchored on a Ruddlesden-Popper support for CO2 electrolysis

Sentencas: Importantly, no sign of performance degradation was observed in galvanostatic tests over a period of 90 h operation under H2S-containing CO2 gas conditions.
Titulo: A sulfur-tolerant cathode catalyst fabricated with in situ exsolved CoNi alloy nanoparticles anchored on a Ruddlesden-Popper support for CO2 electrolysis

Sentencas: Moreover, the catalyst showed no noticeable structural changes even after exposure to 100 ppm H2S/N-2, indicating that the catalyst developed in this study is highly active for CO2 electrolysis with a high tolerance against sulfur-poisoning species.
Titulo: A sulfur-tolerant cathode catalyst fabricated with in situ exsolved CoNi alloy nanoparticles anchored on a Ruddlesden-Popper support for CO2 electrolysis

Sentencas: Therefore, this Ruddlesden-Popper material with in situ exsolved CoNi alloy nanoparticles should be a promising cathode catalyst for practical application to H2S-containing CO2 gas streams that are effluents of power stations or steel making plants.
Titulo: A sulfur-tolerant cathode catalyst fabricated with in situ exsolved CoNi alloy nanoparticles anchored on a Ruddlesden-Popper support for CO2 electrolysis
